Every day is a good hair day！Every day is a good hair day！
10/9/12 2:56 PM

Since ancient times, herbs where appreciated for their pharmaceutical and healing properties. The Father of modern medicine, Hippocrates, is known to have used the power of nature, the essential oils, the herbs and the plant extracts to cure diseases and to find balance for the mind, body and soul. "Nature is the most dominant ruler of all", said Hippocrates. This is exactly the philosophy of APIVITA, for which Hippocrates has been a constant source of inspiration.

Today, APIVITA once again turns the words of Hippocrates into action and presents a new line of creams with healing herbs; the APIVITA Herbal Creams. The long experience and expertise of APIVITA in the extraction of medicinal herbs, along with the deep knowledge of natural ingredients and their actions, guarantee the effectiveness of its products.

Choose the APIVITA natural serum that fits your skin needs and incorporate it into your daily treatment:


  • • HYDRATION with aloe & hyaluronic acid, for multiple hydration to all skin layers
  • • RADIANCE with bilberry & vitamin C, for a radiant, revitalized and fatigue-free skin
  • • ANTI-WRINKLE with resveratrol & vitamin E, for effective anti-wrinkle care
  • • LIFTING with royal jelly & vitamin A, for more firm and supple skin

Each one of APIVITA natural serums is a beauty treatment by itself and can be combined with any of the APIVITA face care ranges targeting in multiple and enhanced action.


For a holistic and intensive skin treatment, try to rotate the APIVITA natural serums throughout the year depending on your skin needs. Extended use of each natural serum maximizes the result.
